_header: Two parts in one ye may espy

BLHar1512.Transcription: ii partis in one ye may well asspyThat is my name I may not tary
BLHar1512.Note: Added to a front flyleaf, with 5-bar staves.

Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Review of Carter,
                 A Dictionary of Middle English Musical Terms”
